name: Penguin Ski - frozen penguin
description:
Penguin Ski game is inspired from a little puny penguin who was lost in glacier.Please help him to go out!

CAUTION: Penguin Ski is super addictive


How to play
•Tap the arrow up or down to keep iced runaway seamless
•Mind the trap and the obstacles on the road, they can hide a crash up ahead!



Game players will feel highly challenged with the increasingly difficult challenges when the pitfall density is getting closer to each other. You need to keep your eyes open and your hands ready on the ski poles because one false move and your Penguin are bury in a ice coffin.
This cute Penguin will bring you endless joy!

Some features:
•Free Penguin Ski game app
•The excellent and fantastic graphics
•The easy- to- use controls
•Addictive gameplay and soundtrack
•Social Features - share your high score photos on facebook!
Whether looking to beat a friend's record, complete missions or unlock achievements, Penguin Ski packs a full load of fun for everyone!


Hours of fun for you, your friends and your family.

Download Penguin Ski for Free, right now!
